subject: Volvo Ocean Race
Sailboats and Sailing
Boats and Boating
lead_paragraph: The question is whether anybody in the all-too-real world is much in the mood to keep close track of sailors courting danger for the sake of a mere sporting event.
snippet: The question is whether anybody in the all-too-real world is much in the mood to keep close track of sailors courting danger for the sake of a mere sporting event.
